item.title: Legendary Stoners Jay & Silent Bob Are Now In Call Of Duty With These Wacky Items
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/legendary-stoners-jay-silent-bob-are-now-in-call-of-duty-with-these-wacky-items/1100-6530786/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Call of Duty's tradition of celebrating marijuana and stoner culture continues today with the debut of Jay and Silent Bob added to the game as playable characters. Players can now buy multiple Jay and Silent Bob DLC bundles that allow them to take on their standard form, or their "Bluntman" and "Chronic" alter egos.

Here's what's included in each bundle, both of which are available for 2,400 COD Points each ($20).

Jay and Silent Bob Tracer Pack

  • Jay and Silent Bob operator skins
  • Doobie Wreck LW3AI Frostline sniper rifle (blue and yellow tracers)
  • Golden Calf Kompakt 92 SMG (blue and yellow tracers)
  • Smoke Death FX
  • Gimme a Light finishing move
  • Poppin' Off emote
  • Mooby's weapon charm
  • In Sync calling card
  • Mooby Joint decal
  • Snoochie Boochie emblem

Bluntman and Chronic Tracer Pack

  • Bluntman and Chronic operator skins
  • Bluntman Stuntman Krig C assasult rifle
  • Chronic Unapologetic Jackal PDW SMG (pink and purple tracers)
  • Joint Leaf Death FX
  • Bong Staff Bo staff with Joint Leaf Death FX
  • Smoke You Out finishing move
  • Did that Happen? emote
  • Joint Power calling card
  • Blunts Out, Suit Up emblem
  • Doobage Duo spray

This isn't the only stoner-themed DLC coming to Black Ops 6 and Warzone to celebrate 4/20. Later this month, Black Ops 6 is adding a new version of Nuketown called "Blazetown," while a new limited-time mode called Joint Operations is on the way as well. This includes variants of multiple different modes that play out in a single match. These include: Head Stash (TDM), Inhalation (Domination), Hotbox (Hardpoint), Very High Target (HVT), and Munchies (Kill Confirmed). During these matches, players will face changing effects, including double health, low gravity, visual hallucinations, and third-person POV.

Before this, 2023's Modern Warfare III welcomed Cheech and Chong, along with Snoop Dogg.

In other news, Call of Duty: Warzone just recently brought back the game's OG map, Verdansk, and it's helping the game's popularity grow again.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: The Last Of Us Complete: Collector's Edition Announced, Preorders Available Now
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/the-last-of-us-complete-collectors-edition-announced-preorders-available-now/1100-6530787/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Sony announced The Last of Us Complete: Collector's Edition is coming to PS5 on July 10. The new edition of Naughty Dog's acclaimed post-apocalyptic series will include The Last of Us Part I, The Last of Us Part II Remastered, and the Left Behind DLC chapter, getting you the entire saga in one package, along with a steelbook case, comics, art prints, and more. Preorders for the $110 The Last of Us Complete: Collector's Edition are available now, but supplies are limited, so you'll want to head over to PlayStation Direct and grab a copy for it sells out.

The Last of Us Complete: Collector's Edition

$110 | Releases July 10

The Last of Us Complete: Collector's Edition includes physical copies of The Last of Us Part I and The Last of Us Part II Remastered for PS5, as well as the Left Behind prequel chapter DLC. It also includes a selection of physical collectibles

  • Steelbook case with new cover art featuring Ellie
  • The Last of Us: American Dreams Comics Issues 1-4 with new cover art
  • Four lithographic art prints
  • Thank You letter from the game's writer and director Neil Druckmann
  • Collector's box

Preorders are available exclusively at PlayStation Direct. Note that you'll have to sign in with your PlayStation Network account and wait in a digital queue to preorder.

Many of the inclusions in The Last of Us Complete: Collector's Edition are also available separately, including The Last of Us Part 1 for $49.49 (was $70), The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered for $50 (or on PC for just $45), and The Last of Us: American Dream graphic novel for $19.72. The standard edition of the games and comic come with their original cover art, which differs from the versions included in the new The Last of Us Complete: Collector's Edition.

Speaking of special edition The Last of Us releases, the DualSense The Last of Us Edition controller is back in stock at Walmart. It's available for its normal price of $85, and you'll want to pick one up soon since these often sell out fast.

If you're looking for more The Last of Us merch that is not included in the new Collector's Edition, there are several art books available based on the games, as well as action figures, apparel, and more.

The Art of The Last of Us is on sale for $35.81 (was $50), and features 184 pages of concept art and behind the scenes material for the original PS3 game. A similar art book is available for the sequel, and two different versions exist. The Art of the Last of Us Part II Deluxe Edition includes the 200-page hardcover book with unique cover art, a slipcase, and a gallery-quality lithograph print for $45.24 (was $90). A standard edition that comes with just the book is also available for $29.70 (was $50).

There's also The Last of Us: Escape The Dark Board Game, which reimagines the events of the games as a cooperative board game and features a striking black and white illustration style. Collectors will also want to check out the official Joel and Ellie action figure two-pack that is available for $39.79 at Amazon (was $50). And for anyone looking to embody the TV version of Joel's rugged style, you can grab the jacket he wears in the show for $298 from apparel company Huckberry. Check the list below for a round-up of all our favorite The Last of Us deals.

The Last of Us Deals

  • The Art of the Last of Us -- $35.81 ($50)
  • The Art of the Last of Us Part 2 Deluxe Edition with Lithograph Print -- $53.24 ($90)
  • The Art of the Last of Us Part 2 Standard Edition -- $29.70 ($50)
  • The Last of Us: American Dream (Graphic Novel) -- $19.72
  • The Last of Us Part 1 -- $49.49 ($70)
  • The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered -- $50
  • The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered (PC) -- $45 ($50)
  • Joel's Jacket from The Last of Us TV Show -- $298
  • Joel and Ellie Action Figures -- $39.79 ($50)
  • PlayStation DualSense Controller: The Last of Us Edition -- Sold Out
  • The Last of Us: Escape The Dark Board Game -- $69.33 ($75)
